title: Perfect!

embed.description: Video of Pentakill's "live musical carnage" in Bandle City, performing Mortal Reminder from the new album Grasp of the Undying, recorded in the catacombs of the Shadow Isles.

replies.body:
Definitely one of *the best* cinematics Riot has done. WELL DONE RIOT :D

Not a fan of the music, but that's just me. I thoroughly enjoyed Teemo being kicked in the face, though.

>Never have I been more proud to be a Karthus player :P

Tower diver! gotta get away,get away.

haha xD

The highest point in my League career was getting a pentakill in ranked, with Karthus, in the Pentakill Karthus skin!
So I have a special place in my heart for Karthus :P

yeah one of my fav champs who i just rarely play anymore.

its great wooping some ass by doing more then just pressing R as the meme suggests
Yea haha ikr, they don't know the effort of landing all those Q's xD
Teemo died, I have to leave a like

No, hes still kickin. 

GET IT
